channel.title: Formating my comp
channel.description: Hey guys I'm trying to reformat my computer but whenever I do it all the programs are gone but the files remain :S and when I try to delete c drive when it tells me to delete which partition I want to. It says It can't delete it because it's needed for the XP instalation.

item.title: Formating my comp
item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

Hey guys I’m trying to reformat my computer but whenever I do it all the programs are gone but the files remain :S and when I try to delete c drive when it tells me to delete which partition I want to. It says It can’t delete it because it’s needed for the XP instalation.

Read full topic
